info.name: Custom menu
info.summary: Modify the display of the menu.
info.description:
Custom menu allows you to modify the position of the main menu by creating a panel on the left of the interface or with a big menu on the top. You can also define apps that must be displayed in the top menu. Fully customisable.
This application is rather suitable for instances that activate a lot of applications.
Use the shortcut `Ctrl`+`o` to open and to hide the side menu. Use `tab` to navigate.
You can customize colors depending of the theme (Dark theme and Breeze Dark).
You can report a bug or request a feature by opening an issue.
Requirements:
* PHP >= 8.0 * App `theming` enabled
